about_the_game:
Barricade is a zombie horde shooter with a classic 90's feel. Players use objects to build a barricade that protects their only source of upgrades. Endless waves of zombies will exploit weaknesses in your defenses. Will you juggle building, shooting, and repairing, or be overrun?

BUILD, SHOOT, REPAIR, SURVIVE

  • Build your barricade using any objects you can find. Everything you see can be used.

  • 10 waves of zombies, will you survive?

  • Powerful guns with alternate fire modes that provide a different way to destroy the horde.

  • No gimmick gun play that is back to basics. No reloading, no aim down sights, just point and shoot 90's style.

  • Different zombie types each with their own abilities and characteristics.

  • Secrets to be unlocked that reward players who find them.

  • Single player means you can't blame your team for failure.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Players fight and kill zombies using guns. 
- Low poly body parts will fly from corpses of monsters / creatures/ zombies (gibs).
- There is green blood spray from hit zombies.
